document.full_text: connecticut's middle-class would get a $300 property tax credit -- down from the current $500 break governor dannel malloy initially wanted to abolish, under a revised budget plan he unveiled thursday.
document.title: connecticut governor offers middle-class $300 property tax break
lines_and_colors: connecticut's middle-class would get a $300 property tax credit -- down from the current $500 break governor dannel malloy initially wanted to abolish, under a revised budget plan he unveiled thursday.
